div.head: 昏亂
div.div: clouding with disorder; state of turmoil

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: clouding with disorder; state of turmoil

sense.def: ① Illness Sign Combined Designation of hun kuei 昏憒 , muddle-headedness, with kuang luan 狂亂 , madness with disorder. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry ling yang jiao 羚羊角：中惡毒風，卒死昏亂 不識人 , “To be struck by the malign and poison wind [results in] sudden [appearance of] death, with clouding with disorder and a failure to recognize persons”.

② Pathological Mechanism in the sense of hun luan 混亂 , confusion. Ben cao bie shuo 本草別說 Substance Entry dang gui 當歸：氣血 昏亂者，服之即定 , “When those whose qi and blood are in a state of turmoil ingest it, it will stabilize them”.
